name: MESMERIZED
description:
DESCRIPTION

Play as Alex, a mind doctor in a steampunk universe. Enter the subconscious of your patients to explore unique dioramas as you solve challenging puzzles. Collect especial items and find an way to heal them all. Only you can fix their minds! 


CREDITS

This game is our final project for Development of Digital Games specialization course at PUCRS.  It is a collaborative piece of work,  were we all contributed to construct the Game Design.

Vivianne Predebon - 2D Artist
Jessica Azambuja -  3D Artist

* Attention, for now the game has 3 levels *
